channel.title: help on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in help on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-04
item.description: Coinbase Multi-Factor Authentication Hack Affects at Least 6,000 Customers (1 minute read) Between March and May this year, hackers used a flaw in Coinbase’s account recovery process to bypass SMS multi-factor authentication and transfer funds out of at least 6,000 customers’ accounts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-04
item.description: Facebook will host a paid movie premiere this month (2 minute read) Facebook will host the premiere of The Outsider, a documentary about the National 9/11 Memorial and Museum in New York City.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-24
item.description: China is building a GitHub alternative called Gitee (3 minute read) Chinese companies have grown due to the technological decoupling between the US and China.
